text:
Company: Morrow-Sawyer
Role: Thermostat Repairer

About Us:
Morrow-Sawyer is a leading provider of HVAC solutions, dedicated to delivering exceptional customer service and innovative products. We strive to create a welcoming environment for all employees, where everyone feels valued and empowered to succeed.

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled Thermostat Repairer to join our team. As a Thermostat Repairer, you will be responsible for diagnosing and repairing thermostats, ensuring efficient and safe operation. This role offers flexibility to meet individual needs, and we are committed to creating opportunities for candidates of all abilities.

Responsibilities:

 Diagnose and repair thermostats, ensuring efficient and safe operation
 Collaborate with colleagues to resolve complex issues
 Maintain accurate records of repairs and maintenance
 Provide exceptional customer service

Qualifications and Experience:

 2+ years of experience in HVAC repair or a related field
 Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
 Ability to lift up to 25 pounds and work in a fast-paced environment
 We offer reasonable accommodations for all roles, and this position can be adapted to meet individual needs

Perks and Benefits:
We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $45,000 to $60,000 USD, based on your experience and skills. We also offer a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance, as well as a 401(k) matching program.
